mapper.select: SELECT choice_idx , user_idx , M.pfm_idx , M.create_date , (SELECT stored_name FROM poster_info PI WHERE M.pfm_idx = PI.pfm_idx) posterImg , name pfmName , ticket_start ticketStart , ticket_end ticketEnd FROM my_choice M INNER JOIN performance P ON M.pfm_idx = P.pfm_idx WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx } ORDER BY ticket_start
